channel.title: I have a problem that is really bugging me!
channel.description: Ok ill go into the client and ill clikc make new server and it will say type in anything and then click login so i do. So i get in and i start summoning all the items i want and everything but right when i am about to go do something like fight it disconnects me and i cant get back on the same on i was just on. PLEASE HELP

item.title: I have a problem that is really bugging me!
item.dc:creator: @Hennessy Hennessy
item.description:
@Hennessy wrote:

Well riddle me this? How are all these people making clients, i mean I would be up to making my own just need some direction.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a problem that is really bugging me!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I’m using the phone. No its not 56K. Guess i went on when 20 people were firemaking. Still doesn’t change my opinion. Still Eww.

Hennessy:

Is there a better one that i can register on and download and play and get high and get good items easy?

Check the server Status page.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a problem that is really bugging me!
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Wow… No idea what you said but I’m guessing you clicked “Start Server”.

Now, you are logged in? Ok… You spawn and you have fun but then! A monster! AHH! You attack it and you see a white text come to the center of the screen! Oh no? IT’S! IT’S! Connection LOST!

Basically, give the NPC’s HP

Read full topic
